definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: exchange, recompense;—´[[ת]] Ru 4:7; sf. [[תְּמוּרָתוֹ]] Le 27:10 + 3 t.; [[תְּמוּרָתָהּ]] Job 28:17; —exchange = thing acquired by exchange Le 27:10, Le 27:33, Job 28:17; [[חֵיל תְּמוּרָתוֹ]] Job 20:18 wealth acquired by exchange (fig.; rd. poss. [[הֵילוֹ]] as his wealth (so) his exchange, Bu); recompense (for worldliness) Job 15:31; abstr. exchanging Ru 4:7 (‖[[גְּאוּלָּה]]).
